dcterms:description: The dataset consists of clinical thoracic CT scans of 1010 patients collected from diagnostic and lung cancer screenings, assembled by seven academic centers and eight medical imaging companies. Each axial slice is considered an individual image, resulting in a total of 246,016 CT slices.
dcterms:title: The Lung Image Database Consortium image collection (LIDC-IDRI)
